```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(plotly)

```


```{r}
dt=read.table("SameDifferent30ZX6P7VF8VS4DHTMU0AQZIOO342JE.txt",header = F)
print(dt$V1)

tt = unlist(strsplit(as.character(dt$V1), ";"))

key_num = list()
key_cha = list()
RT = list()
Fir_img = list()
Sec_img = list()
for (i in 1:length(tt)){
 temp = unlist(strsplit(tt[i],","));
 key_num[i] = as.numeric(temp[2])
 key_cha[i] = temp[3]
 RT[i] = as.numeric(temp[4])
 Fir_img[i] = as.numeric(temp[5])
 Sec_img[i] = as.numeric(temp[6])
}

data = cbind(matrix(unlist(key_num)),unlist(key_cha),unlist(RT),unlist(Fir_img),unlist(Sec_img))
data = data.frame(data,stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r}
keyNum = data.frame()
keyCha = list()
RT = data.frame()
Fir_img = data.frame()
Sec_img = data.frame()
for (i in 1:length(tt)){
 temp = unlist(strsplit(tt[i],","));
 keyNum = rbind(keyNum,as.numeric(temp[2]))
 keyCha[i] = temp[3]
 RT = rbind(RT,as.numeric(temp[4]))
 Fir_img = rbind(Fir_img,as.numeric(temp[5]))
 Sec_img = rbind(Sec_img,as.numeric(temp[6]))
}

data2 = cbind(keyNum,RT, Fir_img,Sec_img)
colnames(data2) = c("keys","rt","Fimg","Simg")
data2 = data2[-1,]


same = data2[data2$Fimg==data2$Simg,]
sum(same$keys==1)/dim(same)[1]


```
